sqlMap.update:
update bener_board set bTime = #bTime#
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage1 = #bImage1#, bImageo1 = #bImageo1#, bLink1 = #bLink1#, bExposure1 = #bExposure1#
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage2 = #bImage2#, bImageo2 = #bImageo2#, bLink2 = #bLink2#, bExposure2 = #bExposure2#
where bSite = #bSite#
update bener_board set bImage3 = #bImage3#, bImageo3 = #bImageo3#, bLink3 = #bLink3#, bExposure3 = #bExposure3# where bSite = #bSite#
update bener_board set bImage4 = #bImage4#, bImageo4 = #bImageo4#, bLink4 = #bLink4#, bExposure4 = #bExposure4# where bSite = #bSite#
update bener_board set bImage5 = #bImage5#, bImageo5 = #bImageo5#, bLink5 = #bLink5#, bExposure5 = #bExposure5# where bSite = #bSite#
update bener_board set bImage6 = #bImage6#, bImageo6 = #bImageo6#, bLink6 = #bLink6#, bExposure6 = #bExposure6# where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage1 = null, bImageo1 = null, bLink1 = null, bExposure1 = 'N'
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage2 = null, bImageo2 = null, bLink2 = null, bExposure2 = 'N'
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage3 = null, bImageo3 = null, bLink3 = null, bExposure3 = 'N'
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage4 = null, bImageo4 = null, bLink4 = null, bExposure4 = 'N'
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage5 = null, bImageo5 = null, bLink5 = null, bExposure5 = 'N'
where bSite = #bSite#

update bener_board set bImage6 = null, bImageo6 = null, bLink6 = null, bExposure6 = 'N'
where bSite = #bSite#
